text: A gem in the heart of London Best service I have seen of any hotel in London

We came to London for my Daughter's birthday and we stayed at Mondrian | The hotel is very nice, elegant, clean | And modern | Staff very kind, helpful and always ready for your needs. | Location wise is awesome. 10 minutes walk to London Eye and go from there to the main London attractions. | Andres at the lobby help us so much with tips and places to visit. | Overall we had an awesome time in London and Mondrian Hotel
Location is perfect in central London Only 10minutes away from the palace and Big Ben About 15min walk to London eye Beautiful central location

This London hotel was fairly quiet at night Bus stop outside hotel and tube station 5 6 minutes walk away for good links into centre of London Complimentary continental breakfast was a welcome bonus. Nothing
I loved everything The staff was very nice and gave us a special birthday request Everyone was extremely helpful and I loved the view of the London Eye. How cold it was in London
Have stayed here in London for the last seven years It is very convenient to all locations Butlers is excellent and the rooms are fine Great place to stay in London. Nothing

Hotels in London do not run cheap, and certainly the Mondrian London is not inexpensive, but I found good value in this beautiful property. My standard room was very spacious and beautiful, and the view out my window of the London Eye was a lovely bonus. The staff were very helpful and I was able to arrange both early check-in and late check-out, which met my needs. The concierge desk was also helpful in advising me on what sites were feasible is not in the limited time I had available.

Dopo varie ricerche su hotel a Londra ho deciso di prenotare il Mondrian vista la posizione e chiaramente la bellezza. La vista dalla mia stanza davvero unica.. di notte potevo vedere Londra con tutte le sue luci ed il london eye davvero fantastico!! Personale sempre a disposizione sorridente.. complimenti!! Ci torneremo di sicuro. Enjoy London

It was my First Visit to London, and this place greeted me so well. Owned by an Indian Family.The staff is very generous and always available,will go out of the way to help you.Very easy to get to central London and the buffet breakfast was the best part :-). Will Surely visit this place again.

this hotel is truly a extraordinary gem in the heart of London, I recently stayed here for 4 days, and can not describe enough the level of this location, from the amazing spa, to the superb service, from a room which defines luxury, to amenities that are just a notch above the other 5 star hotels, this is definitely a hotel not to miss out in London.

This is simply our favourite hotel in London. | The service, the ambience, the quality of the food just everything about it exudes opulence but not in a tacky way. | From the library room to the garden room a most relaxing oasis in the heart of London. | Yes it's pricy, yes it's a tad ostentatious but if you can afford it then just do it!

Such a lovely hotel with really attentive and professional staff. Valet parking on arrival was so easy and convenient, and the price of parking actually very reasonable and what you would expect for a hotel in the centre of London. The location was brilliant, easy access to Blackfriars tube station, and also easy to walk to sights such as St Paul's cathedral, and the Tate is just around the corner. The Sea Containers bar was great, with a lovely view across London, well worth a visit for some cocktails even if you're not staying in the hotel! The room was fantastic, fully equipped with everything we needed (and more!), really clean and lovely decor. Would definitely stay here again on future visits to London.
Lovely quiet corner in the middle of London fantastic brekfast. Nothing
Excellent place to stay with families in the heart of London. None
Hotel perfectly situated in the center of London cosy rooms very kind staff

It was supposed to be a 5 night stay but it was so comfortable that we ended up staying for 2 weeks! | Very large rooms for London standard alone is a huge plus, but it comes with great bathroom and modern technology and facilities such as the Spa and a good business centre. | Even when there are hiccups, the management deals with them very graciously. | It is THE place to stay in London.
Great value for money in the center of London. The room and fast WiFi
Great location close to the London eye but a quiet nights stay. Nothing
So central 10 minutes to centre London Beautiful hotel Amazing hotel bar X. Nothing
In the heart of London Very good service and staff Great breakfast many options
